metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9525 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In the cron package through 3.0pl1-128 on Debian, and through3.0pl1-128ubuntu2 on Ubuntu, the postinst maintainer script allows forgroup-crontab-to-root privilege escalation via symlink attacks againstunsafe usage of the chown and chmod programs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cron - 3.0pl1-128.1ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cron package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0pl1-128.1ubuntu1.2').
